snippet: Fire-breathing dragons, stirred up by human industry, terrorize a small town in this young adult tale set in modern-day Ontario.
abstract: Dan Kois reviews book The Story of Owen: Dragon Slayer of Trondheim by E K Johnston.
lead_paragraph: Fire-breathing dragons, stirred up by human industry, terrorize a small town in this young adult tale set in modern-day Ontario.

headline.seo: ‘The Story of Owen,’ by E. K. Johnston
